name: Spirit Disruption
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A burst of spiritual energy ripples out from target point within range to a 30 foot radius. Creatures must make a saving throw using their worst stat, taking 8d6 psychic damage on a failure and half damage on a success.

Incorporeal creatures and all undead creatures are harshly affected by this spell. They take 12d6 psychic damage, ignoring resistance and immunity, with no saving throw. If they are incorporeal, they are forcibly made corporeal for 1 minute and cannot become incorporeal again.
